name: polyverse-boost-notebook
description: Polyverse Boost Application Modernization tool uses AI and source code analysis to find code bugs, security defects, generation documentation and convert to modern programming languages.

polyverse-boost-notebook.defaultDir.description: Default directory for Polyverse Boost notebook save files

polyverse-boost-notebook.outputLanguage.description: Default output language for Polyverse Boost automatic code conversion

polyverse-boost-notebook.testFramework.description: Default test framework for Polyverse Boost automatic test code generation

polyverse-boost-notebook.defaultOrganiza.description: Default organization for Polyverse Boost billing

polyverse-boost-notebook.currentKernelCo.description: Boost Kernel to use for Automated Processing

polyverse-boost-notebook.refreshAnalysis.description: Force analysis refresh when existing Cell analysis is available

polyverse-boost-notebook.defaultOutputFo.markdownDescription: Select your preferred *output format* for exporting analysis results.

commands.title: Boost: Load Source File (using File Dialog)
Boost: Batch Build Notebook from Selected Folder (via File Explorer)
Boost: Process Current File with Selected Kernel Automatically (Offline)
Boost: Batch Process Folder with Selected Kernel Automatically (Offline)
Boost: Build Analysis as Output File
Boost: Build Analysis Summary as Output File
Boost: Build All Analysis Output Files in Folder
Boost: Build Folder or Project Analysis Summary as Output

scripts.pretest: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run copy:test-data
scripts.esbuild-pretest: npm run clean && npm run esbuild && npm run lint && npm run copy:test-data
